Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar.  Beat in egg and vanilla.  Combine the flour, baking soda, cream of tartar and salt; gradually add to the creamed mixture.  Shape into two 5-in. rolls; wrap in plastic wrap.  Refrigerate for 1 hour or until firm.  Unwrap; cut into 1/4-in. slices.  Place 2 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets.  Bake at 350 degrees F for 8-10 minutes.  Remove to wire racks to cool.
